divs: Sighting DetailsI looked out of my angle bay window which faces south and saw a stationary black sphere hovering. I went outside and saw it move to the left and hover again. There were no bird wings and no fluctuation of movement. It was not a bird. It was not a balloon, helicopter, or plane. It was a hovering black sphere. I went inside and looked again and it was gone. I was quite excited at the time for it was my first UFO sighting.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Emmaus
There were no other sightings in Emmaus on or around October 23rd 2013
Summary: I saw a black sphere hovering which moved left, hovered again, and disappeared.
